ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Yet still you prefer the life of the dunya
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But no, you prefer the life of the world,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: No; but you prefer the present life,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: However, (the disbelievers) prefer the worldly life
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: But rather you prefer the life of this world!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Rather you prefer the life of this world.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Nay! you prefer the life of this world,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Nay, but you prefer the present life;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: But ye prefer the life of the world
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But you prefer the life of this world,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: But ye prefer the life of this world,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: But you prefer the life of this world,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Nay (behold), ye prefer the life of this world;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Nay, you prefer the life of this world;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But you prefer the present life,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But you prefer the present life.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But you prefer the worldly life,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [87:16] Nay, but you prefer (or read yu’thirūna, ‘they prefer’) the life of this world, to the Hereafter,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: But ye prefer the life of the world) you chose to strive for the life of the world and preferred the reward of the life of the world to the reward of the Hereafter.
